pullrequest.title: Support more joint types in model editor

content.raw:
findings:

1. empty reference body: links rotate but eventually goes out of control

2. joint child link or parent link set as reference body: same as 1.

3. a third link set as reference body (a link whose pose is not affected by the rotation of parent and child link): links rotate as expected

So I think 3. works best as least in my test setup. I left reference body empty as default in the inspector and it's up to the user to specify it.
content.html:
findings:

  1. empty reference body: links rotate but eventually goes out of control

  2. joint child link or parent link set as reference body: same as 1.

  3. a third link set as reference body (a link whose pose is not affected by the rotation of parent and child link): links rotate as expected

So I think 3. works best as least in my test setup. I left reference body empty as default in the inspector and it's up to the user to specify it.
